id: Score an HP Omen Intel Core i7-8750H 6-Core GeForce RTX 2080 Ti Gaming Laptop for Under $1900
paragraph: If you buy something through this post, IGN may get a share of the sale. For more, read our Terms of Use.For more Black Friday 2018 coverage, check out our Black Friday article complete with tips, predictions, and early Black Friday deals.HP.com launched some coupons today that work specifically on HP Pavilion Gaming and HP OMEN laptop and desktop computers. These prices are the lowest we've seen all year for comparable configs, but don't let that fool you into thinking these laptops are built with budget in mind. The HP OMEN in particular is HP's premium line and build quality is superior to anything else you'd find in this price range. The coupons are as follows:The configs I listed below are the best deals I found using these coupon codes. Many of them require steps you'll need to take to obtain the  desired config, but it is well worth it.Here's your chance to get the lowest price I've seen on a fully equipped, fully warrantied prebuilt gaming right with the RTX 2080 Ti video card. Eric Song is IGN's deal curator and spends roughly 1/4 of his income on stuff he posts. Check out his latest Daily Deals Article, follow him at IGN Deals on Twitter and Facebook, and subscribe to his IGN Deals Newsletter.We encourage you to read our updated PRIVACY POLICY and COOKIE POLICY.
